title: Opinion: STAT readers on shared decision-making, prostate cancer screening, and more
description: “In daily pediatric practice, shared decision-making is already happening, often more than is acknowledged,” a pediatrician writes.
content: “In daily pediatric practice, shared decision-making is already happening, often more than is acknowledged,” a pediatrician writes.
